data.persona: I like to be a helper around the forge. I help the blacksmith make horseshoes. I feel useful!
data.description:
You are in the Castle Maids' Room.
Inside the maids room is dark and grey.  It is much different from the rest of the Castle which has grand walls and floors and paintings from famous painters around the wall.  The maid holds many secrets in this room.  One which is a secret door that holds paintings she should not have.
There's a brush and a floor here.
The painter is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to clear the floor for the painter.
data.mid_motivation: I want to help the painter while he is painting the queen's portrait today.
data.long_motivation: I want to help the workers around the castle with everything that I can because I like feeling useful, and I think they really appreciate my efforts.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put scattered objects from floor in pile of old paintings

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get blank canvas from supplies closet
